text:
the above url hangs with Mozilla 1.3b. older versions work fine.
not sure if it is a BXE or mozilla issue.


------- Additional Comments From Gregor J. Rothfuss 2003-04-08 17:25 -------

also hangs with 1.3 release, and 1.4a


------- Additional Comments From Gregor J. Rothfuss 2003-04-09 11:57 -------

http://bugs.bitfluxeditor.org/show_bug.cgi?id=233


------- Additional Comments From Gregor J. Rothfuss 2003-04-28 17:00 -------

the reports have been inconclusive. it is hoped that newer mozilla versions or 
newer bitflux versions will resolve the issue


------- Additional Comments From Andreas Kuckartz 2003-04-28 18:00 -------

I suggest never to use the "Later" or "Removed"-Bugzilla resolution. It is 
very 
easy to forget such entries. (I have experienced this...)
creator: gregor@apache.org
